title: What is the default saving path of pictures or videos? How do I change the path？
answer:
1、When the SD card is available:
      The default saving path for pictures is sdcard/DCIM/Camera.
      The default saving path for videos is sdcard/DCIM/Camera.
2、When the SD card is not available:
      The default saving path for pictures is HWUserData/DCIM/Camera
      The default saving path for videos is HWUserData/DCIM/Camera
3、The path can’t be changed.
